Report Abuse Never seen so many strange comments, that are totally unrelated to the story in my life! Bottom line? Vladimir Lenin is dead! It is barbaric to keep him on display like a museum relic. Should George Washington have been preserved and kept on display? No, because you respect the man's accomplishments and ideals, not his body. If the Russians truly respected the man, they would finally put his body to rest in a proper( non-viewing) tomb, instead of on display, like a tourist attraction.
